message: Since Dawson mentioned it on Twitter earlier this week...I think we need a FNPDC tonight!  I won't be online until at least 8pm...but FNPDC knows no bounds!
http://images.icanhascheezburger.com/completestore/2008/11/1/128700363077331066.jpg
FNPDC! I'll be going out tonight but I'll try to hop in via the iPhone app.
I will make a fashionable entrance and keep the app handy as well. Not sure what I'm up to tonight, but I'm sure I'm up to something.
Up to no good, I would imagine.
/play greatjob
Still eerily quiet around here....
I'm going to open a beer in like 20 minutes
if I remember I'll do a video
we found out our desk drawers work as bottle openers
forgot to do a video
which means I am now drinking a nice bottle of Anchor Steam
I am here! Hello Conrove!
Ok now I'm home (not drinking) but going to go to bar 821 or something. Might check in on mobile later to see how it's going,
You are correct, or if you're saying Convore fast five times drunk it's Convore Confour Con...what?
Conrove=drinking club for convore!
Checking in to say hi. I'm still at The Mann watching Bright Eyes. Hope everyone is drinking and mingling!
Not sure where everyone is, Herb. Have a good time!
MIdnight, I'm turning into a pumpkin...
10:39 home already. Sooo sleeeeepy
